title: 42: Aristotle's Four Causes
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Aristotle's four causes are a nifty way to think about definition. What, in its essence, is a thing? Anything? Well, Aristotle took a crack at it. We four high school teachers weigh in.
itunes:author: Grimer, Burger, Thomber
itunes:subtitle: Because you can't have just one
itunes:summary: Aristotle's four causes are a nifty way to think about definition. What, in its essence, is a thing? Anything? Well, Aristotle took a crack at it. We four high school teachers weigh in.
itunes:title: 42: Aristotle's Four Causes
